aka: He Flew Ahead - Karl Schwanzer | Architect's Poem

cast.name: 尼古拉斯·奥夫恰雷克 Nicholas Ofczarek

this_title: Er flog voraus - Karl Schwanzer | Architektenpoem
trans_title: He Flew Ahead - Karl Schwanzer | Architect's Poem
introduction: "He Flew Ahead" is the unconventional, polyphonic portrait of an extraordinary personality. Karl Schwanzer was an architect of world renown, a visionary, artist, legend, teacher and poet. He understood architecture as an instrument to bring people joy. Nicholas Ofczarek in the role of the architect shows Schwanzer's masterful talent and also that true, virtuoso lightness draws from the mysterious depths of the soul, into which no one ventures without danger.
chinese_title: Er flog voraus - Karl Schwanzer | Architektenpoem
